mainText:
Rest In Peace, Steve!

You have been my number 1 idol since I first got my iPod back in 2007.
Since then I've been looking onto you! I've got every single product you've
invented.


I hope one day I will be as successful as you!

Thanks for changing me to become an ambitiousness person! I'll miss you!
header: You have been my number 1 idol!
author: Sammie
